verses.text: And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*; the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* shall be \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*: and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of it upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* thereof: his \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* shall be of the same: and thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* his \w pans|strong="H5518"\w* to receive his \w ashes|strong="H1878"\w*, and his \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, and his \w basons|strong="H4219"\w*, and his \w fleshhooks|strong="H4207"\w*, and his \w firepans|strong="H4289"\w*: all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for it a \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* of \w network|strong="H4639"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; and upon the \w net|strong="H7568"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* thereof.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it under the \w compass|strong="H3749"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*, that the \w net|strong="H7568"\w* may be even \w to|strong="H5704"\w* the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* for the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

And the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* shall be \w put|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, and the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* shall be upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* it.

\w Hollow|strong="H5014"\w* with \w boards|strong="H3871"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it: as it was \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* thee in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, so shall they \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 27.8 \ft it was…: Heb. he shewed\f*

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*: for the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w* \add there shall be\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* for the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*:

And the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* thereof and their \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And likewise for the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* in \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add there shall be\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add cubits\add* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and his \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*; the \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

¶ And \add for\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \add shall be\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*.

And the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* on the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* \add shall be\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

The \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of one \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \add of the gate shall be\add* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

And on the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \add shall be\add* \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \add cubits:\add* their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.

¶ And for the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, wrought with \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*: \add and\add* their \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add shall be\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.

All the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add shall be\add* \w filleted|strong="H2836"\w* with \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

¶ The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* every \w where|strong="H2572"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.\f + \fr 27.18 \ft fifty…: Heb. fifty by fifty\f*

All the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* in all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* thereof, and all the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* thereof, and all the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, \add shall be of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w beaten|strong="H3795"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, to cause the \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* to \w burn|strong="H5927"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w*.\f + \fr 27.20 \ft to burn: Heb. to ascend up\f*

In the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*, which \add is\add* before the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w order|strong="H6186"\w* it from \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* to \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* unto their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* on the behalf of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
